title: Behavior of function from graph of derivative

content.question: Which of the following could be the graph of f ?

choices.label: The figure presents a graph in the x y coordinate plane, with the origin labeled O. The number 1 is indicated on each axis. The graph is a curve that begins below the x axis and to the left of the y axis. It moves upward and to the right, crosses the x axis at approximately negative 1.2, and reaches a maximum at the point with coordinates that are approximately negative .7 comma .5. The curve then moves downward and to the right, crosses through the origin, and reaches a minimum at the point with coordinates that are approximately .7 comma negative .5. The curve then moves upward and to the right, crosses the x axis at approximately 1.2, and ends above the x axis and to the right of the y axis.

The figure presents a graph in the x y coordinate plane, with the origin labeled O. The number 1 is indicated on each axis. The graph is a curve that begins above the x axis and to the left of the y axis. It moves downward and to the right, crosses the x axis at approximately negative 1.2, and reaches a minimum at the point with coordinates that are approximately negative .7 comma negative .5. The curve then moves upward and to the right, crosses through the origin, and reaches a maximum at the point with coordinates that are approximately .7 comma .5. The curve then moves downward and to the right, crosses the x axis at approximately 1.2, and ends below the x axis and to the right of the y axis.

content.answer: The figure presents a graph in the x y coordinate plane, with the origin labeled O. The number 1 is indicated on each axis. The graph is a curve that begins above the x axis and to the left of the y axis. It moves downward and to the right, crosses the x axis at approximately negative 1.6, and reaches a minimum at the point with coordinates that are approximately negative 1.2 comma negative .5. The curve then moves upward and to the right and reaches a maximum at the origin. topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
